                <ul class="report_reason report_reason1">

                        <input type="radio" id="haojia_error2_one" data-type="21" name="haojia_error2" class="rd">
                        <label for="haojia_error2_one"></label>
                        <label for="haojia_error2_one" class="">商品图片侵权</label>
                    </li>

                    <li>
                        <input type="radio" id="haojia_error2_two" data-type="22" name="haojia_error2" class="rd">
                        <label for="haojia_error2_two"></label>

                    </li>

                    <li>
                        <input type="radio" id="haojia_error2_three" data-type="23" name="haojia_error2" class="rd">
                        <label for="haojia_error2_three"></label>

                    </li>

                        <input type="radio" id="haojia_error2_four" data-type="24" name="haojia_error2" class="rd">

                        <label for="haojia_error2_four" class="">其他内容侵权</label>
                    </li>

                    
                </ul>
                <button>确认提交</button>
            </div>
        </li>
        <!-- 新增其他举报 -->
        <li class="li other goods" data-name="其他" data-type="29" id="other_alert">
            其他
        </li>
    </ul>
</div>
      <!--打分模块-   id 是  rating_  +  文章id  -->

            <ul class="pagination"><li><a href="#comments" class="pageCurrent pagination-item">1</a></li><li><a href="p2/#comments" class="pagination-item">2</a></li><li><a href="p3/#comments" class="pagination-item">3</a></li><li><a href="p4/#comments" class="pagination-item">4</a></li><li class="pagedown"><a href="p2/#comments" class="pagination-item"><i class="icon-angle-right-o-thin"></i></a></li><li class="jumpToPage">转至<input type="text" class="input_num" id="input_num">页</li><li><a href="javascript:void(0);" class="a_jumpTo" onclick="return on_check_comment_page(4, '', this)">GO</a></li></ul>        </div>
    </div>
    <!-- 评论列表 end -->
    
</section>

                          </li>
                                                                           </ul>
      </div>
    </div>
</section></div>
</div>
<div class="aside-right" id="feed-side">
